text: Ra allahale timimathi juna anukampa gareko cha tyasala'i samjhi rakha ra tyasa vacala'i pani junaki usale timibata li'eko thiyo, jaba timile bhaneka thiyau ki hamile (allahako adesa) sunihalyaum ra svikara garyaum. Ra allahasamga dara'irakha kina bhane allaha timra hrdayaka gopya kuraharu ramrari jandacha
